page.title: 16The Petworth Festival
page.content: The Petworth Feastival is an English Festival of music and art. The Festival happens every year, and in 1985 it was on 15th-23rd June. There were musical evenings and lunchtime concerts. Music of all kinds was featured, from Handel's music to celebrate the 300th anniversary of his birth, to jazz in the Park on the last night. There was a young art exhibition upstairs at the Leconfield Hall and Andy Wood displayed some of his paintings downstairs. The Sealed Knot Society turned the clock back to the Civil War on 22nd June. We enjoiyed a spectacular display of flying kites and model aircraft at the Kite Festival in the Park on the 23rd June.
